humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: According to the pathology report, sentinel lymph node biopsy #1 and #2 both have metastatic breast carcinoma. The largest focus of metastasis measures 3 mm in greatest microscopic dimension in node #1 and 2 mm in node #2. Therefore, based on the AJCC staging system and the new rules provided, the N stage is N1, which indicates metastases in 1 to 3 axillary lymph nodes.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The patient has metastatic breast carcinoma identified in 2 sentinel lymph nodes, with the largest focus measuring 3 mm in greatest microscopic dimension in node #1 and 2 mm in node #2. This corresponds to pN2a (i+) based on the 8th edition AJCC staging system.
